verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6458>"Chisel<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> like the <S%H7223>first:<s%> and I will <S%H3789>write<s%> on the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that were on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3871>tablets,<s%> which you <S%H7665>broke.<s%>

Be <S%H3559>ready<s%> by the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and come <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and <S%H5324>present<s%> yourself there to me on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

No <S%H376>one<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> with <S%H408>you;<s%> neither let <S%H376>anyone<s%> be <S%H7200>seen<s%> throughout all the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> neither let the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> nor <S%H1241>herds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H4136>before<s%> that <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>"

He <S%H6458>chiseled<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like the <S%H7223>first;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3947>him,<s%> and took in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3871>tablets.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and <S%H3320>stood<s%> with him <S%H7121>there,<s%> and proclaimed the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> passed <S%H5674>by<s%> before <S%H6440>him,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaimed,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh!<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> a <S%H7349>merciful<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> slow to <S%H750>anger,<s%> and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth,<s%>

<S%H5341>keeping<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> for <S%H505>thousands,<s%> <S%H5375>forgiving<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and disobedience and <S%H2403>sin;<s%> and that will by no <S%H5352>means<s%> <S%H5352>clear<s%> the <S%H6485>guilty,<s%> visiting the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> on the <S%H1121>children,<s%> and on the <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children,<s%> on the <S%H8029>third<s%> and on the fourth <S%H7256>generation.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H4116>hurried<s%> and bowed his <S%H6915>head<s%> toward the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "If now I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> please let the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> in the <S%H3212>midst<s%> of <S%H7186>us;<s%> although this is a stiff-necked <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H5545>pardon<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and our <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and take us for your <S%H5157>inheritance.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3772>"Behold,<s%> I make a <S%H1285>covenant:<s%> before all your <S%H5971>people<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6381>marvels,<s%> such as have not been <S%H1254>worked<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth,<s%> nor in any <S%H1471>nation;<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> which you are shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for it is an awesome <S%H3372>thing<s%> that I do with <S%H6213>you.<s%>

<S%H8104>Observe<s%> that which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H1644>Behold,<s%> I drive out <S%H6440>before<s%> you the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

Be <S%H8104>careful,<s%> lest you <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> where you are <S%H935>going,<s%> lest it be for a <S%H4170>snare<s%> in the midst of <S%H7130>you:<s%>
but you shall <S%H7665>break<s%> down their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H7665>dash<s%> in pieces their <S%H4676>pillars,<s%> and you shall cut <S%H3772>down<s%> their <S%H842>Asherim;<s%>
for you shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> no <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H410>god:<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7067>Jealous,<s%> is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

<S%H3772>"Don't<s%> make a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> lest they play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and one <S%H7121>call<s%> you and you <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%>

and you <S%H3947>take<s%> of their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H2181>make<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods.<s%>
"You shall make no cast idols for <S%H6213>yourselves.<s%>

"You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread.<s%> <S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4150>you,<s%> at the time appointed in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib;<s%> for in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib<s%> you came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
"All that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%> is <S%H4735>mine;<s%> and all your livestock that is <S%H2142>male,<s%> the <S%H6363>firstborn<s%> of <S%H7794>cow<s%> and <S%H7716>sheep.<s%>

The <S%H6363>firstborn<s%> of a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> you shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> with a <S%H7716>lamb:<s%> and if you will not <S%H6299>redeem<s%> <S%H6202>it,<s%> then you shall break its neck. All the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> you shall <S%H6299>redeem.<s%> No one shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H7387>empty.<s%>

<S%H8337>"Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H5647>work,<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7673>rest:<s%> in plowing <S%H2758>time<s%> and in <S%H7105>harvest<s%> you shall <S%H7673>rest.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks<s%> with the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H614>harvest<s%> at the <S%H8141>year<s%>'s <S%H8622>end.<s%>

<S%H6471>Three<s%> times in the <S%H8141>year<s%> all your <S%H2138>males<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For I will drive <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you and <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> your <S%H1366>borders;<s%> neither shall any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2530>desire<s%> your <S%H776>land<s%> when you go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H6471>three<s%> times in the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H7819>offer<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H2557>leavened<s%> <S%H2077>bread;<s%> neither shall the sacrifice of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> be <S%H3885>left<s%> to the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

"You shall bring the <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H7225>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of your <S%H127>ground<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> "You shall not <S%H1310>boil<s%> a young <S%H1423>goat<s%> in its <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H2461>milk.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3789>"Write<s%> you these <S%H1697>words:<s%> for in <S%H6310>accordance<s%> with these <S%H1697>words<s%> I have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you and with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

He was there with <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights;<s%> he neither <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> nor <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%> He <S%H3789>wrote<s%> on the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments.<s%>

It <S%H4872>happened,<s%> when Moses came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> with the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H3027>hand,<s%> when he came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know that the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone<s%> by reason of his speaking with <S%H1696>him.<s%>

When <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5785>behold,<s%> the skin of his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone;<s%> and they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to come near <S%H5066>him.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H175>them,<s%> and Aaron and all the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H4872>him;<s%> and Moses spoke to <S%H1696>them.<s%>

<S%H310>Afterward<s%> all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5066>near,<s%> and he gave them all of the <S%H6680>commandments<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> with him on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
When <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with <S%H5414>them,<s%> he put a <S%H4533>veil<s%> on his <S%H6440>face.<s%>

But when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H5493>him,<s%> he took the <S%H4533>veil<s%> <S%H5493>off,<s%> until he came <S%H3318>out;<s%> and he came <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that which he was <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H6440>face,<s%> that the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>put<s%> the <S%H4533>veil<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> until he <S%H935>went<s%> in to speak with <S%H1696>him.<s%>
